function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on robotics for infectious disease control","Impact":"Reduced employment opportunities for human workers","Mitigation":"Invest in training and upskilling programs for displaced workers","Technologies":"Robotic systems for surface disinfection, diagnosis, and medication delivery","People":"Human workers in industries where robots are being deployed","Owner":"Government, industry leaders"},{"Description":"Rapid implementation of virtual clinics in response to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential misdiagnosis and inadequate patient care","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough training for healthcare providers using virtual platforms, and establish clear protocols for patient screening and triage","Technologies":"Virtual consultation platforms and telemedicine technologies","People":"Patients who rely on virtual consultations, healthcare providers offering virtual services","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"}]}
